titleStmt.title: A serious remembrancer to live well written primarily to children and young people, secondarily to parents, useful (I hope) for all : lastly, compendious remarks of the death of Jonah Lawson who finished his course upon earth the 23d day of the month called February, 1683, in the 14th year of his age / [by] Tho. Lawson.
titleStmt.author: Lawson, Thomas, 1630-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
